title: How to Calculate the Games Back Number for a Sports Teams Standings

steps.title: Play the required games for the teams involved.
steps.content: Play the required games for the teams involved. Keep track.

steps.title: Locate the Win-Loss record standings information.
steps.content: Locate the Win-Loss record standings information. Whether this information is online or in a daily newspaper, make sure it has all the teams you're looking to obtain this number.

steps.title: Lay a piece of paper on a flat writing surface where you can figure out this statistic.
steps.content: Lay a piece of paper on a flat writing surface where you can figure out this statistic.

steps.title: Determine the leader of the division, by finding the team with the most wins, and fewest losses.
